revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Actiontec |model=802AI |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=12/07/2001 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=LNQ802AI |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=No Wires Needed |cpu1_model=Poldhu |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Atmel |fla1_model=AT49BV1614-12TC |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4S641632H-TC75 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=No Wires Needed |wi1_chip1_model=Poldhu |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=HFA3863 |wi1_chip3_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip3_model=HFA3683A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Lucent |eth_chip2_model=LU3X31T |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=schematics, block diagram |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} ''11 Mbps Wireless Access Point''
[http://www.actiontec.com/support/product_details.php?pid=99 Support page] '''Actiontec''''s FCC docs reference the Poldhu chip as a ISL3865CK. "ACTIONTEC", "47-0045-28AF", and "802AI Rev. 1A" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. The manual shows a sample SSID of '''default''' and a MAC with a 00:20:E0 ('''Actiontec''') OUI.
